text: Has anyone read _The Book of Why_ by Judea Pearl? I am in the process of reading it and was curious if people had any thoughts on it!

elements.text: by Judea Pearl? I am in the process of reading it and was curious if people had any thoughts on it!

text: (small ping <@U6S2GUM43> if you are interested in this thread :slightly_smiling_face: )

elements.text: if you are interested in this thread

text: I've read it. Interesting introduction to Causal Inference, but not much else.

elements.text: I've read it. Interesting introduction to Causal Inference, but not much else.

text: I've read it an year ago or so, and didn't left a big impression, other than making me slightly acquainted with the existence of causal inference and causal diagrams.
